name: Dream Water Snoozeberry Sleep & Relaxation Shot, 2.5 fl oz, 4 count

reviews.name: Dream Water Snoozeberry Sleep & Relaxation Shot, 2.5 fl oz, 4 count
reviews.reviewText: This is the best sleep aid available for over the counter purchase. I am saddened it is not available in my local Walmart anymore. It does not have any after effects in the morning and assists with good sound sleep all night long.
reviews.title: Best sleep aid

reviews.name: Dream Water Snoozeberry Sleep & Relaxation Shot, 2.5 fl oz, 4 count
reviews.reviewText:
I purchased 10 (4 pack) of the Snoozeberry and received 4 (4 pack) of Snoozeberry and 6 (4 pack) of Tea (which I did not want or ordered.) I checked the return policy and felt a return wasn't possible for the six items in the time given. We have two stores in our area and neither sells this anymore.

I use this product daily and trust the reliability of it. I found the price more than reasonable here. The ease of ordering and receiving the order were great. My only suggestion would be to make sure you're specific in the comments section when ordering and maybe double checking before these orders go out.
reviews.title: A very reliable sleep aid.

reviews.name: Dream Water Snoozeberry Sleep & Relaxation Shot, 2.5 fl oz, 4 count
reviews.reviewText: My sleep disorder is so bad that I have to take prescription meds. When I have run out of meds (late getting refills), I have supplemented with over the counter stuff, such as melatonin. The "sleep meds" do nothing for me. Melatonin helps, but I build up a tolerance to it over time. Dream water works very well for me. As a matter of fact, I'm not used to having such long dreams. It has definitely improved my sleep and have been able to not rely on caffeine so much. The only drawback, is that I have to drink two bottles to get the best sleep and this stuff is overpriced at the moment. Once it gets down to around a dollar a bottle, I'll feel much better about it.
reviews.title: This insomniac loves it
